verses.verse: And the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it from Ebenezer <S%H72><s%> unto Ashdod <S%H795><s%>.

When the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it into the house <S%H1004><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%>, and set <S%H3322><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it by <S%H681><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%>.

And when they of Ashdod <S%H796><s%> arose early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%>, behold, Dagon <S%H1712><s%> was fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>. And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Dagon <S%H1712><s%>, and set <S%H7725><s%> him in his place <S%H4725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And when they arose early <S%H7925><s%> <S%H8686><s%> on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%>, behold, Dagon <S%H1712><s%> was fallen <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upon his face <S%H6440><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>; and the head <S%H7218><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> and both <S%H8147><s%> the palms <S%H3709><s%> of his hands <S%H3027><s%> were cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8803><s%> upon the threshold <S%H4670><s%>; only the stump of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> was left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to him.

Therefore neither the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%>, nor any that come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> into Dagon's <S%H1712><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, tread <S%H1869><s%> <S%H8799><s%> on the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of Dagon <S%H1712><s%> in Ashdod <S%H795><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>.

But the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon them of Ashdod <S%H796><s%>, and he destroyed <S%H8074><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them with emerods <S%H2914><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6076><s%>, even Ashdod <S%H795><s%> and the coasts <S%H1366><s%> thereof.

And when the men <S%H582><s%> of Ashdod <S%H795><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that it was so, they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> shall not abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with us: for his hand <S%H3027><s%> is sore <S%H7185><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon us, and upon Dagon <S%H1712><s%> our god <S%H430><s%>.

They sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> therefore and gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%> unto them, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What shall we do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with the ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>? And they answered <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let the ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> be carried about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%> unto Gat <S%H1661><s%>. And they carried <S%H5437><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thither.

And it was so, that, after <S%H310><s%> they had carried it about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> was against the city <S%H5892><s%> with a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> destruction <S%H4103><s%>: and he smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%>, and they had emerods <S%H2914><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6076><s%> in their secret parts <S%H8368><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

Therefore they sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> to Ekron <S%H6138><s%>. And it came to pass, as the ark <S%H727><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to Ekron <S%H6138><s%>, that the Ekronites <S%H6139><s%> cried out <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, They have brought about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to us, to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> us and our people <S%H5971><s%>.

So they sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and gathered together <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the lords <S%H5633><s%> of the Philistines <S%H6430><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Send away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and let it go again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his own place <S%H4725><s%>, that it slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> us not, and our people <S%H5971><s%>: for there was a deadly <S%H4194><s%> destruction <S%H4103><s%> throughout all the city <S%H5892><s%>; the hand <S%H3027><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> was very <S%H3966><s%> heavy <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there.

And the men <S%H582><s%> that died <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not were smitten <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8717><s%> with the emerods <S%H2914><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H6076><s%>: and the cry <S%H7775><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
